column4: How would I go about TRIBOOTING with OSX Leopard, Win7, and Ubuntu?
No
I dont have osx
I have win7
I know, it would have to be a hackint0sh
oh oh k
i know
win7 and ubuntu is easy ive heard
yes it is
i have it on my Eee PC 1005ha
you triboot?
dual boot, not triboot
i would never do that
Im thinking about using VMWare
i have windows7 and ubuntu on mine
ive heard that windows only likes to play in the first partition
ubuntu won't sync with your iphone
i'm told you can use and ssh, but i was never able to get it to work
oh yeah lol. So I think I'll probly go with partitioning for Ubuntu and Win7 and VMing OSX.
that's why i have win7 and ubuntu dual-booted.  that way i can sync my itouch and blackberry in windows and run everything else in ubuntu
i can also wirelessly transfer files with my other windows pc's
Yeah thats what ill probly do. Thanks. Better leave before Im banned for discussing VMing OSX lol
